trans-unit.source: Holds an existing collection structure, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>, to be used inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma estrutura existente da coleção, como um <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> ou um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>, para ser usada dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection to add.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Text Usage In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can use the syntax to bind to a collection.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | # # Uso no texto de XAML [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], você pode usar o sintaxe para associar a uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> type.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The collection to add.
trans-unit.target: A coleção para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contained collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a coleção independente é alterada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.CollectionChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles events from the centralized event table.
trans-unit.target: Trata os eventos na tabela de eventos centralizado.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso só reconhece o Gerenciador de objetos do tipo <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o ouvinte tratado o evento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*>propriedade deve ser persistida.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Isso `ShouldSerialize` método é fornecido, pois o <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection%2A>propriedade não tem um valor padrão simples.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica se a propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você invoca esse método se você estiver desenvolvendo ou um designer para o <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>ou desenvolvendo seu próprio controle incorporar <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da propriedade foi alterado do padrão; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso só reconhece o Gerenciador de objetos do tipo <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Objeto que originou o evento.

trans-unit.target: Dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o ouvinte tratado o evento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
